metadata.purpose: Systematic audit of _source folder for AI art prompt potential

rating_scale.1: Almost no value — abstract data, metadata, or purely technical content
rating_scale.2: Minimal value — some world references but no concrete visual details
rating_scale.3: Moderate value — contains some visualizable elements but limited
rating_scale.4: Good value — multiple concrete visual details, characters, or scenes
rating_scale.5: Extremely rich — vivid narrative with specific visual imagery, settings, actions

Learning to sneeze 'open-mouthed, like a roar.' 'Sneezing is the prototype of holding things in.' 'A new type of sneeze might be a new kind of word.' Unusual body/language meditation.
Christian life = 'absorption in the moment.' Pete's video gaming as spiritual model. 'Pristine awareness of whatever is there.' Brief theological aside.
Dark counterpoint: Hitler's 'gaskillers fully absorbed' during atrocities. 'That's the hard question... I don't think about it. Which is a pretty damn hard way of dealing with it.' Moral edge.
Parenting philosophy: 'not being sure about your kid' defines parenthood. 'There's no such thing as a Christian parent.' Faith vs parenting tension. Brief meditation.
Brief quip: 'A modern educational system is an oxymoron... the word moron is in it.' Wordplay only, no visual content.
Education as 'highest theoretical and practical problem.' 'It feels like death. It's got the same boredom, the same implacable finality of death.' Philosophical but abstract.
Brief tease: education has a secret. 'I'm only pretending to be a song-and-dance girl.' Fragment setup only.
Autodidact as mystic: 'The mystic does without the community of the church.' Lincoln and narrator both going it alone. 'A last resort that can only be taken by those who never see the other options.'
